name: Pixvader
description:
Control your space ship and shoot in enemy to save the world.

  • Space - shoot
  • Double space - auto shooting on / off
  • X - bomb
  • Arrows - move
  • 8 levels
  • 8 bosses
  • 6 types of enemy
  • 6 upgrades
  • 2 bonus levels
  • 1 bonus upgrade ( godmode )
